name: Tower Escape (Mykyta)
description:
Hi this is a caual 3D game with top-down view where you play as a Mage trying escape the room. The obly problem is the door that want you to bring some things to it. 

Find these things and you are free! But you only have 20 seconds for it!

How to play:
You actually can play with a keyboard and with a gamepad.
Move - WASD or Left Stick.
Interact - E or Y(north button).

Enjoy!

You can play it in browser or download the build for Windows.

P.S. If you play in browser controller act wierd in the menu but the game itself works fine.

P.P.S. You can download the source project here  https://github.com/MarkianovNikita/TowerEscape
